title: flood
description: Burst water main begins flooding lower levels.

timeline.title: Water Intrusion Detected
timeline.description: Standing water appears in basement corridor. Identify source and shut off water supply.

timeline.title: Electrical Hazard Warning
timeline.description: Electrical panels threatened by rising water. Evacuate basement and shut down affected circuits.

timeline.title: Critical Systems Relocation
timeline.description: Server room humidity spikes. Begin emergency data backup and relocate portable equipment.

timeline.title: Pump Activation
timeline.description: Deploy emergency pumps to remove water. Water level stabilizing but damage assessment needed.

timeline.title: Damage Assessment
timeline.description: Water receding. Conduct preliminary damage assessment of electrical and mechanical systems.

timeline.title: Restoration Planning
timeline.description: Facilities team developing restoration plan. Coordinate with utilities for full power restoration.
